CustomField.description: BODEV:2559 Repurpose Original Renewal ARR for Platform Transfer and OEM>Direct Transfer
CustomField.formula: IF(AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business - Internal Transfer"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer") ), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Won"), For_Renewal__c = TRUE, Opportunity.Original_Renewal_ARR__c > 0, Opportunity.ARR_manual__c > 0 ), ( Total_Sales_Price_ARR__c * Opportunity.Original_Renewal_ARR__c ) / Opportunity.ARR_manual__c , 0)
CustomField.label: Previous OEM ARR
